org.kaaproject.kaa.common.endpoint.security

Class MessageEncoderDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kaaproject.kaa.common.endpoint.security.MessageEncoderDecoder

  • public class MessageEncoderDecoder
extends Object
    The Class MessageEncoderDecoder is responsible for encoding/decoding logic of endpoint - operations service communication.
    Author:
    Andrew Shvayka

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MessageEncoderDecoder.CipherPair
      Cipher Pair holds references for encoding and decoding Ciphers that are initialized with the same key.
